--- In junit@y..., "Sarah Barwig" <sarah@l...> wrote:
> Hi,
> 
> I have just downloaded junit3.7 and installed it. Then I ran the 
self-test
> suite. I have 1 failure out of 90 tests run. It fails in all 3 
TestRunners
> (command line, awt, swing). I haven't introduced any of my own code 
into
> this situation, so I'm still in the "did I configure it all 
correctly?"
> phase.

And, for the sake of the archives, I post my solution. :) Unzip the 
junit3.7.zip into c:\ instead of onto the desktop. Having a path with 
spaces in it, while acceptable in Windows, seems to make the class 
loader in java unhappy.

Sarah
